name: Using the Docs
description: A quick tour of the Vuetify0 documentation site.

steps.title: Search
steps.task: This is the search. It finds components, composables, and guides across the entire documentation.

steps.title: Navigation
steps.task: This is the main navigation sidebar. It organizes all documentation into sections: components, composables, guides, and more.
steps.learn: Where to find the navigation sidebar

steps.title: Table of Contents
steps.task: The TOC shows all headings on the current page. Click any heading to jump directly to that section.
steps.hint: Table of Contents is not available on mobile devices.
steps.learn: How to navigate within a page

steps.title: Page Actions
steps.task: Every page has quick actions: edit on GitHub, report bugs, view source code, and copy as markdown.
steps.learn: How to contribute and report issues

steps.title: Page Metadata
steps.task: Metadata shows the skill level, test coverage, performance tier, and last update date for each feature.
steps.learn: How to assess feature quality and complexity

steps.title: Ask AI
steps.task: This is Ask AI. It's a context-aware assistant that knows the content of the current page and can answer your questions.
steps.learn: Where to find the AI assistant

steps.title: Ask AI Panel
steps.task: Asking a question opens up the Ask AI panel. Here you can see the conversation history and interact with the assistant.
steps.learn: How to use the Ask AI panel

steps.title: Conversation Tools
steps.task: The toolbar has options to save your conversation to Vuetify Bin, copy it, or reset and start fresh.
steps.learn: What the Ask AI toolbar does

steps.title: Settings
steps.task: This is the settings panel. It has theme options, layout preferences, and content filters.

steps.title: Skill Levels
steps.task: These filters control which content appears in the navigation. Beginner shows fundamentals, Intermediate adds detail, and Advanced shows everything.

steps.title: Conclusion
steps.task: That's it for the tour! You're now ready to explore the Vuetify0 documentation like a pro.
